experiences.description: Developed and maintained cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart. Implemented responsive UI designs ensuring seamless performance across different devices. Collaborated with senior developers to understand and apply best practices in app development. Participated in code reviews, debugging, and testing to ensure high-quality code. Gained hands-on experience with state management, RESTful APIs, and third-party libraries.

Designed, developed, and maintained dynamic web applications using React.js for front-end development and Node.js for back-end development. Created responsive and intuitive user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring seamless performance across devices. Collaborated with designers, product managers, and other developers to deliver high-quality projects on time. Implemented best practices for web development, including code reviews, version control (Git), and testing. Integrated RESTful APIs and third-party services to enhance functionality and user experience. Developed and maintained server-side logic, database integration, and API endpoints using Node.js and Express.js.
